translation.en: [woman] This is my diary.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的日记

translation.en: I'm reading you the excerpt from December 12, 1978.
translation.zh:
‎我给你们读小一段
‎1978年12月12日的内容

translation.en: So, it says, "Today was an absolute miserable day."
translation.zh:
‎上面写着：
‎“这是令人伤痛欲绝的一天

translation.en: "Rob never came home last night."
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特昨晚没回家

translation.en: "He never got back to the store, and he never went home."
translation.zh: ‎他没回到店里 也没回家”

translation.en: [woman] When I was about 15,
translation.zh: ‎大概15岁那年

translation.en: I started working at Nisson Pharmacy.
translation.zh: ‎我开始在尼逊药房打工

translation.en: I was a clerk. I was the person at the front and ran the cash register.
translation.zh:
‎我担任书记
‎负责站在柜台前操作收银机

translation.en: I met Rob Piest when he came to work at the pharmacy.
translation.zh:
‎在药店打工期间
‎我认识了罗伯特·皮斯特

translation.en: He was the new stock boy.
translation.zh: ‎他是新来的理货员

translation.en: He did sports.
translation.zh: ‎他热爱运动

translation.en: He was a gymnast.
translation.zh: ‎是个体操运动员

translation.en: And he had outdoor interests, um, in hiking, and he was a photographer.
translation.zh: ‎他也喜欢徒步旅行 是个摄影师

translation.en: He was actually working there to save money for a camera and a car.
translation.zh: ‎他打工是为了存钱买相机和买车

translation.en: He was very close with his family.
translation.zh: ‎他和家人的关系非常要好

translation.en: He loved his family and he talked about 'em a lot.
translation.zh:
‎他很爱他的家人
‎聊天时经常提起他们

translation.en: I remember when I came to work on December 11.
translation.zh: ‎记得那天是12月11日 我照常去上班

translation.en: In December in Chicago, it is freezing.
translation.zh: ‎12月的芝加哥天寒地冻

translation.en: And the cash register was right at the front of the door,
translation.zh: ‎收银机的位置刚好在药房大门前

translation.en: and people were in and out a lot, and I would get cold.
translation.zh: ‎经常有人出入 所以我觉得冷

translation.en: And so, Rob had a very nice, uh, blue down jacket.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特有一件很好看的蓝色羽绒外套

translation.en: So I asked him if I could borrow it and wear it at the front
translation.zh: ‎我问他能不能暂时借给我穿

translation.en: while I was working the cash register.
translation.zh: ‎因为我要站在柜台前干活

translation.en: There was a man, a middle-aged man in, you know, a flannel shirt
translation.zh:
‎我注意到
‎有个身穿法兰绒衬衫的中年男子

translation.en: walking around the store.
translation.zh: ‎在店里逗留了好一阵子

translation.en: I asked the pharmacist and he said, oh, he was a contractor
translation.zh:
‎我问药剂师那个人是谁
‎他说对方是个承包商

translation.en: who was there because they were thinking about doing some remodeling in the store.
translation.zh: ‎因此当时他们打算装修店面

translation.en: As the night was winding down,
translation.zh: ‎夜幕低垂之时

translation.en: Rob came back to the front of the counter and said, "Hey, can I have my jacket back?"
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特走到柜台前说：
‎“可以把外套还给我吗？

translation.en: "I'm gonna go outside and talk to that contractor about a job."
translation.zh: ‎我要出去跟那个承包商谈一个活”

translation.en: And then he put his jacket on and he went outside.
translation.zh: ‎他穿上外套就走出门去

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] And then, you know, the store stayed busy.
translation.zh: ‎药房就跟往常一样忙碌

translation.en: So I kind of lost track of time
translation.zh: ‎忙碌中 我也忘了时间

translation.en: and the fact that, you know, we were getting ready to close.
translation.zh: ‎一直到接近打烊之时

translation.en: And his mom came in and wanted to know where he was.
translation.zh: ‎他妈妈进来问她儿子去了哪里

translation.en: And I asked her, I said, "He's outside talking to some contractor about a job."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“他在外面
‎跟一个承包商谈一个活”

translation.en: And she said, no, he… she didn't see him out there.
translation.zh: ‎她说她刚刚没看到他在外面

translation.en: So she said, "Tell him just call me when he gets back,
translation.zh:
‎接着她说：
‎“等他回来后 叫他给我打电话

translation.en: and I will come over and pick him up."
translation.zh: ‎我会过来接他”

translation.en: And so, when the final closing was at 10:00,
translation.zh: ‎药房在晚上10点打烊

translation.en: um, his mom had called and said, "Is he back yet?"
translation.zh: ‎他妈妈打来问：“他回来了吗？”

translation.en: And I said, "No. He's not here at all."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“没有 他没在店里”

translation.en: I knew that that night was Rob's mom's birthday.
translation.zh: ‎我知道那晚是罗伯特的妈妈生日

translation.en: That's why she waited for a while,
translation.zh: ‎所以她才等了很久

translation.en: 'cause they had a birthday celebration planned for that night.
translation.zh: ‎他们说好当晚要一起庆祝生日的

translation.en: Rob would never have missed his mom's birthday.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特绝不可能错过他妈妈的生日

translation.en: He was missing.
translation.zh: ‎他失踪了

translation.en: [Gacy] First of all, drop that "Mr. Gacy" thing.
translation.zh: ‎首先 别叫我“加西先生”

translation.en: [investigator] Okay, John. That was technical.
translation.zh: ‎好的 约翰‎ ‎我们只是按照规矩办事

translation.en: [Gacy] I don't know who the hell you're talking to. Just John.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你在跟谁说话
‎叫我“约翰”就对了

translation.en: [investigator] Okay, John. Go ahead.
translation.zh: ‎好的 就叫你约翰 继续说

translation.en: [Gacy] John, or JW, or whatever the hell else they call me,
translation.zh:
‎叫我约翰或JW都可以
‎别人怎么叫我 你们就怎么叫我

translation.en: or whatever else comes to your mind if I get too mad.
translation.zh:
‎如果我惹恼你了
‎你想叫我什么就叫我什么

translation.en: [Gacy] Nobody wants to accept what the hell I say.
translation.zh: ‎没人愿意接受我的说法

translation.en: Because what I tell you is… is what I know as fact.
translation.zh:
‎因为我对你所说的话
‎都是我所谓的真相

translation.en: I have nothing to gain. I have nothing to lose by telling you something that's not the truth.
translation.zh:
‎说谎对我没有任何好处
‎也没有任何坏处

translation.en: But I'm getting to the point that I keep going over and over and over every fucking thing.
translation.zh: ‎我只是觉得我一直在重复说同一件事

translation.en: But I'm at the breaking point with it.
translation.zh: ‎但我就快要崩溃了

translation.en: I don't… I don't know how much more of this shit I can take.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我还能承受多少

translation.en: -[investigator] What do you think happen-- -[Gacy] I don't know. I… I don't.
translation.zh:
‎-那你认为究竟是…
‎-不知道 我真的不知道

translation.en: [man] 1978. I had just left the Public Defender's Office.
translation.zh:
‎1978年
‎我刚刚离开公设辩护人事务所

translation.en: I decided to go into private practice.
translation.zh: ‎并决定开设私人法律事务所

translation.en: Sitting in my new office and, uh, I get a telephone call.
translation.zh:
‎某天 我在崭新的事务所里
‎接到了一通电话

translation.en: [Amirante] I said, "Law office." He said, "Hi, Sam. This is John Gacy."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“这是法律事务所” ‎他说：“萨姆 你好 我是约翰·加西”

translation.en: I said, "Hi, John, how are you?" He said, "Can you do me a favor?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“你好 约翰” ‎他说：“可以帮个忙吗？”

translation.en: I said, "Sure. What do you need?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好啊 你需要什么？”

translation.en: "Find out why I'm being tailed by the Des Plaines police." "No problem."
translation.zh:
‎“帮我查一下
‎我为什么被德斯普兰斯市警探跟踪” ‎我说：“没问题 我帮你查一下”

translation.en: [Sam] I had been Chief Public Defender in Des Plaines, where this was going on.
translation.zh:
‎事情爆发时 我担任过
‎德斯普兰斯市首席公设辩护人

translation.en: I knew all those guys over there. I know the chief, I know the mayor.
translation.zh:
‎我认识那边的人
‎我认识警局局长 也认识市长

translation.en: I'll… I'll find out. I'll ask some questions, I'll ask around.
translation.zh: ‎我说我会帮他查查看 帮他到处问问

translation.en: And so, my first client in my private practice was John Gacy.
translation.zh:
‎于是他成了
‎我开设私人法律事务所后第一个客户

translation.en: You know, everybody from the neighborhood,
translation.zh: ‎芝加哥西北部小区的人

translation.en: from the northwest suburbs of Chicago knew John Gacy.
translation.zh: ‎都认识约翰·加西

translation.en: He had a construction business called Painting, Decorating and Maintenance.
translation.zh: ‎他经营一家承建公司 叫PDM公司

translation.en: He was also a Democratic Precinct Captain in the Cook County Democratic Organization.
translation.zh:
‎他也是库克县民主组织的
‎民主党选区区长

translation.en: Precinct Captains take care of the people in the neighborhood.
translation.zh:
‎选区区长的职责
‎是照顾小区居民的福祉

translation.en: So if somebody needed a garbage can, or somebody needed a bulb changed,
translation.zh: ‎例如有人需要垃圾桶或是更换灯泡

translation.en: or somebody needed their driveway shoveled, or something,
translation.zh: ‎或是车道需要铲雪等等

translation.en: the Precinct Captain would be there to help them.
translation.zh: ‎选区区长就会出手相助

translation.en: Gacy was the best Precinct Captain in the Norwood Park Democratic Organization.
translation.zh:
‎加西是诺伍德公园民主组织
‎最称职的选区区长

translation.en: Everybody knew him.
translation.zh: ‎大家都认识他

translation.en: I got active in the Democratic Party
translation.zh: ‎我在民主党渐渐活跃起来

translation.en: because I wanted to get into politics someday.
translation.zh: ‎因为我希望有朝一日能够从政

translation.en: And so, I knew him through doing that.
translation.zh: ‎我们也是通过党务认识的

translation.en: He called me because he thought I had influence.
translation.zh: ‎他求助于我是因为我在当地有影响力

translation.en: Not because he thought I was a great lawyer. He thought I had clout.
translation.zh: ‎不是因为他认为我是个出色的律师 ‎而是因为他认为我有权有势

translation.en: So the first thing I did was go to the police.
translation.zh: ‎所以我马上前往警局

translation.en: "Hey, John Gacy's a good guy. What are you guys following him for?"
translation.zh:
‎我问：“约翰·加西是个好人
‎你们为什么跟踪他？”

translation.en: They'd say, "There's a missing kid. We think he has something to do with it."
translation.zh:
‎警方说：“有个孩子失踪了
‎我们认为案情与他有关”

translation.en: I'd be like, "You're crazy, a missing kid. You obviously have the wrong guy."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“你们肯定疯了 少年失踪案？
‎你们肯定找错人了”

translation.en: [man 1] I was assigned to the Piest case the day after he disappeared.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特·皮斯特失踪隔天
‎我受任调查此案

translation.en: Rob Piest had a part-time job at Nisson Drugs.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特·皮斯特
‎是尼逊药房的兼职职员

translation.en: It was on Touhy Avenue in Des Plaines.
translation.zh: ‎药房位于德斯普兰斯市图伊大道

translation.en: A missing persons report was filed by the Piest family.
translation.zh: ‎警方接获了皮斯特家提交的失踪投报

translation.en: They were in shock, I believe,
translation.zh: ‎他们一家人都陷入恐慌

translation.en: because this is just so unlike the young man to disappear.
translation.zh: ‎因为这个少年是不可能失踪的

translation.en: When Mr. and Mrs. Piest came into the office,
translation.zh: ‎皮斯特夫妇走进办公室时

translation.en: uh, they were… uh, distraught, completely.
translation.zh: ‎他们当时忧心如焚

translation.en: They had been out all night searching for Rob.
translation.zh: ‎他们整晚都在外头寻找罗伯特

translation.en: We talked, and they convinced me in about a minute,
translation.zh: ‎我们聊了好一阵子后 他们让我确信

translation.en: that, in fact, uh, we had something more than a runaway on our hands.
translation.zh: ‎此案不是单纯的离家出走案

translation.en: And that's really what led our office, that is the prosecutor's office, uh, to become involved in the case.
translation.zh:
‎于是我们的办公室
‎也就是检察署不得不介入此案

translation.en: [man 2] Rob Piest was a great all-American kid, 15 years old.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特·皮斯特
‎是个不折不扣的15岁美国少年

translation.en: Come from a very stable family, well-liked by everybody,
translation.zh:
‎跟大部分人一样
‎来自一个非常健康的家庭

translation.en: didn't have any girlfriend problems or any other issues.
translation.zh: ‎从没有过感情等其他问题

translation.en: And he had a… a brother and a sister.
translation.zh: ‎他有一个哥哥和一个姐姐

translation.en: Uh, he was the youngest. And everybody got along well with that family.
translation.zh: ‎他是家中的老幺 家人都相处得很好

translation.en: [Tovar] The officer that filed the missing persons report
translation.zh: ‎查办该案的警员前往那间药房

translation.en: went back to the drug store and asked who had been there that night
translation.zh: ‎查办该案的警员前往那间药房 ‎询问当晚有谁去过药房

translation.en: and incorporated all those names of the people that had been there.
translation.zh: ‎并搜集了当晚到过药房者的名单

translation.en: Among them was John Wayne Gacy's name.
translation.zh:
‎名单上出现了
‎约翰·维恩·加西的名字

translation.en: He was there to, uh, get an estimate for a job he wanted to do there at the drugstore.
translation.zh: ‎他去药房给装修工程估价

translation.en: One of the first things we always do, we see who we're dealing with.
translation.zh: ‎办案第一步就是查看相关人士的背景

translation.en: So we started running the names, checking them for criminal histories.
translation.zh:
‎于是我们开始调查名单上的人
‎有没有犯罪前科

translation.en: I think the next-to-last name I checked was Gacy's name.
translation.zh:
‎印象中
‎加西是名单上倒数第二个名字

translation.en: And we immediately got a hit on him, that he had done time in Iowa for sodomy.
translation.zh: ‎由于他在艾奥瓦州有过鸡奸罪的前科 ‎马上就引起了我们的注意

translation.en: So immediately, that put him at the head of the line as far as possible persons of interest.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们马上将他列为头号嫌犯

translation.en: John Wayne Gacy lived in Norwood Park Township.
translation.zh:
‎约翰·维恩·加西
‎住在诺伍德公园镇区

translation.en: It's a Chicago address,
translation.zh: ‎那是一个芝加哥的地址

translation.en: but it's an unincorporated area of Cook County.
translation.zh: ‎那是库克县的一个非建制地区

translation.en: [Albrecht] Joseph Kozenczak was Head of Investigations of the Des Plaines Police Department.
translation.zh:
‎当时德斯普兰斯警局侦查科科长
‎是约瑟夫·科森恰克

translation.en: He went out to talk to John Gacy.
translation.zh: ‎他去找约翰·加西问话

translation.en: [Gacy] Lieutenant Kozenczak, the asshole from Des Plaines Police Department,
translation.zh:
‎科森恰克警督
‎那个来自德斯普兰斯警局的混账

translation.en: talked to me about the Piest boy disappearance,
translation.zh: ‎曾就皮斯特失踪案找过我问话

translation.en: asked me if I'd come down and give a witness statement.
translation.zh: ‎他问我能不能到警局做笔录

translation.en: I told him I didn't have time, that I'd just had a death in the family,
translation.zh:
‎我跟他说我没空
‎因为我家里刚有人过世

translation.en: that I'm waiting for a call from my mother in Arkansas.
translation.zh: ‎我在等我妈妈从阿肯色州打电话过来

translation.en: So he told Kozenczak he had to take care of his family things,
translation.zh: ‎他跟科森恰克说他需要处理家事

translation.en: and Kozenczak told him it would just be a while, just come out.
translation.zh:
‎科森恰克说做笔录不需要很长时间
‎尽管来一趟就可以了

translation.en: He got very aggravated about that.
translation.zh: ‎他对此非常生气

translation.en: He said, "You know, Kozenczak has no respect for the dead."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“科森恰克不尊重往生者”

translation.en: [Gacy] I said, "You're very rude at the time of death."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“我家刚死了人
‎你很不懂礼数”

translation.en: And I just told him, you know, "When I got time, I'd get down there."
translation.zh:
‎于是我跟他说：“我有空就过去一趟
‎我迟点再过去”

translation.en: I said, "I'll come down later." "How much later?"
translation.zh:
‎于是我跟他说：“我有空就过去一趟
‎我迟点再过去” ‎“‘迟点’是什么时候？”

translation.en: "I don't know. When I get down there, I'll be down there."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“我不知道 我一有空就过去”

translation.en: [Tovar] One detective was assigned to watch the house.
translation.zh: ‎当时有个警探在他家门前驻守

translation.en: They had seen Gacy arrive in his van.
translation.zh: ‎有警察看到加西开着面包车抵达警局

translation.en: Well, when the van left, they followed the van,
translation.zh: ‎面包车一开走 警察就尾随上去

translation.en: thinking that Gacy was in it,
translation.zh: ‎他们以为车上的人是加西

translation.en: when, in fact, it was one of his workers that took the van.
translation.zh: ‎实则是其他工人把面包车开走了

translation.en: When they finally caught up to it, they realized it wasn't Gacy.
translation.zh: ‎警察追上去后 才发现加西不在车上

translation.en: By that time, Gacy was gone.
translation.zh: ‎当时加西已经离开了

translation.en: [man 3] When Gacy did come into the police station,
translation.zh: ‎加西抵达警局时

translation.en: he comes in at 3:00 in the morning, everybody's gone.
translation.zh: ‎是在凌晨3点 当时警局的人都下班了

translation.en: He's covered with mud. His pants are full of mud.
translation.zh:
‎只见他全身都是泥巴
‎裤子沾满了泥巴

translation.en: His, you know, his shoes are all full of mud.
translation.zh: ‎鞋子沾满了泥巴

translation.en: His car with the back bumper was packed with mud.
translation.zh: ‎他车尾的保险杠也沾满了泥巴

translation.en: There was mud up to the axles. He had mud all over the floorboard.
translation.zh:
‎泥巴一路延伸到车轴上
‎踩板上也都是泥巴

translation.en: Uh, and there was nobody there to talk to him. So he left.
translation.zh:
‎当时警局没人能够给他做笔录
‎所以他就离开了

translation.en: [Gacy] I drove over to the Des Plaines police station
translation.zh: ‎我开车到德斯普兰斯警局

translation.en: because I knew they were waiting for me.
translation.zh: ‎我以为警察会在警局等候我

translation.en: [investigator] Who'd you see?
translation.zh: ‎你原本约了谁？

translation.en: [Gacy] I said, "I'm here to see Lt. Kozenczak." He says, "Oh, he left hours ago."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“我要见科森恰克警督”
‎对方说：“他几小时前离开了”

translation.en: I says, "Well, okay, tell him I'll be back in the morning."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好吧 跟他说我早上再回来”

translation.en: [Bedoe] But what happened? Why did he get covered with mud?
translation.zh:
‎究竟发生了什么事？
‎他为什么全身沾满了泥巴？

translation.en: How'd he get mud in the car?
translation.zh: ‎车上怎么都是泥巴？

translation.en: [Gacy] I went down to the police station around ten, eleven o'clock in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎我在早上10、11点抵达了警局

translation.en: They said, "Mr. Kozenczak wants to talk to you."
translation.zh: ‎对方说：“科森恰克警督要找你问话”

translation.en: I said, "All right, I'll wait a few minutes."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好啊 我可以等一下”

translation.en: 11:00 came, 12:00 came, I says, "Look," I says, "I've got to go
translation.zh:
‎过了11点、12点
‎我说：“听好 我赶时间

translation.en: 'cause I've got things to do."
translation.zh: ‎因为我还有事要忙”

translation.en: I don't know what they were waiting for.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道他们在等什么

translation.en: [Tovar] They told me to entertain him for a while.
translation.zh: ‎他们叫我去拖延他

translation.en: He was not under arrest, we couldn't detain him.
translation.zh: ‎他当时尚未被捕 我们无权扣押他

translation.en: So I had to use, you know, my imagination on how to keep him there.
translation.zh: ‎我必须靠自己的想象力留住他

translation.en: I've been a pretty good judge of character,
translation.zh: ‎我看人挺准的

translation.en: and I quickly determined this guy had a big ego,
translation.zh:
‎我很快就看出
‎这个家伙很容易自我膨胀

translation.en: so I just kinda fed on that a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎所以我刻意对他说了几句奉承话

translation.en: And a lot of times he was just full of crap, you know.
translation.zh: ‎很多时候他尽说些有的没的

translation.en: He was exaggerating his importance, you know, but I didn't care.
translation.zh:
‎他会夸大自己的地位
‎可是我根本不在乎他是谁

translation.en: All I cared was he was staying there
translation.zh:
‎我的首要任务是
‎在不动用武力的前提下

translation.en: without me having to force him to stay there.
translation.zh:
‎我的首要任务是
‎在不动用武力的前提下 ‎把他留在警局

translation.en: [Sullivan] So I go over to the little room, introduce myself.
translation.zh:
‎于是我走进那个小房间
‎做个自我介绍

translation.en: And I said, uh, "Do you want to give us permission to… to go take a look in your house?"
translation.zh:
‎我问：“那你允许我们去搜查
‎你的房子吗？”

translation.en: "Since you're telling us you've got nothing to hide."
translation.zh: ‎毕竟你说你没什么好隐瞒的”

translation.en: He said, "No. I'm not gonna give you permission."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“不行
‎我不允许你们搜查我的房子”

translation.en: I already suspected the guy.
translation.zh: ‎当时我已经开始怀疑这个家伙了

translation.en: Now the question is, what does he have to hide?
translation.zh: ‎问题是他到底想要隐藏什么？

translation.en: If we're gonna get a search warrant, we'd better get it soon
translation.zh: ‎如果要申请搜查令 那就要尽快了

translation.en: so that he doesn't destroy anything that might be there.
translation.zh: ‎不然他就会毁灭可能存在的证据

translation.en: [Gacy] Then around 3:30 or 4:30, or I don't know what the hell time it was,
translation.zh:
‎到了3点30分还是4点30分
‎我也不知道几点

translation.en: they wanted the keys for my house and that.
translation.zh: ‎他们跟我要家里的钥匙

translation.en: "What do you want the keys for my house?"
translation.zh: ‎我问：“你们要我家钥匙干什么？”

translation.en: "We've got a search warrant for your house,
translation.zh: ‎“我们申请到了你家的搜查令

translation.en: so you either give us the keys or we're gonna kick the door down."
translation.zh:
‎要么你把钥匙交给我们
‎要么我们踢门而入”

translation.en: I said, "I don't have to give you nothing." You know?
translation.zh: ‎我说：“我没必要给你们任何东西”

translation.en: But they… they took the keys from me.
translation.zh: ‎可是钥匙还是给他们拿走了

translation.en: [Bedoe] The investigators from Des Plaines,
translation.zh: ‎德斯普兰斯警局的警探取得搜查令

translation.en: when they executed the search warrant, they were looking for Robert Piest.
translation.zh: ‎德斯普兰斯警局的警探取得搜查令 ‎是为了寻找罗伯特·皮斯特的下落

translation.en: We were optimistic that maybe he was being held captive.
translation.zh: ‎我们有理由相信他被绑架了

translation.en: [Tovar] Gacy's house was decorated very eclectic.
translation.zh: ‎加西家的室内装潢很古怪

translation.en: He had a tiki bar there and a pool table.
translation.zh:
‎屋里有一个夏威夷风情的酒吧
‎以及一个台球桌

translation.en: In the bedrooms, he had pictures of clowns.
translation.zh: ‎卧室里挂着小丑的画像

translation.en: They were a little weird.
translation.zh: ‎看起来有点诡异

translation.en: I think they were more evil than… [chuckles] …than nice clowns, you know, but…
translation.zh:
‎这些小丑看起来不像善类
‎反而透露出邪气 不过…

translation.en: to each his own.
translation.zh: ‎每个人的美感不同

translation.en: [Tovar] He had an office where he had all sorts of things on his, uh, bulletin board.
translation.zh: ‎他有个办公室 布告板贴得满满的

translation.en: But the hallway
translation.zh: ‎诡异之处在于

translation.en: going from the front from the kitchen to the back bedrooms was really bizarre.
translation.zh:
‎从前面厨房
‎一路延伸到后面卧室的走廊

translation.en: It was dark brown,
translation.zh: ‎那是一条深褐色的走廊

translation.en: and then it had zigzag lines of yellow paint going to the back.
translation.zh:
‎墙上有几条曲折的黄色线条
‎一路延伸到后面

translation.en: Found books that… talking about…
translation.zh: ‎发现一些书 内容都是…

translation.en: "Gay Boys Must Die," I think, was one of the titles.
translation.zh: ‎我记得其中一本书叫《男同志必死》

translation.en: We found some sex toys, some torture toys.
translation.zh: ‎我们找到了一些性玩具、性虐玩具

translation.en: We found chains, handcuffs.
translation.zh: ‎还找到了铁链、手铐

translation.en: We got to the trash, and in the trash, we found a photo receipt.
translation.zh:
‎我们也搜了垃圾桶
‎并发现了一张打印照片的单据

translation.en: Most people nowadays don't know about this,
translation.zh: ‎这年头很多人不知道

translation.en: but in the old days, you took your film to a drugstore to get it printed.
translation.zh: ‎以前我们要把底片拿到药房去打印

translation.en: And, uh, they would give you a tab off an envelope.
translation.zh:
‎药房会把照片放进一个拉环信封里
‎交给客户

translation.en: And, uh, we didn't know what it could possibly be,
translation.zh: ‎我们不清楚那是什么照片

translation.en: but we were just hoping we'd find some connection.
translation.zh: ‎只希望能找到线索

translation.en: Also a high school class ring from Maine West High School.
translation.zh:
‎我们也在屋里发现
‎西缅因高中的毕业戒指

translation.en: Maine West is located in Des Plaines.
translation.zh: ‎西缅因高中就位于德斯普兰斯市

translation.en: It had, uh, initials JAS on them.
translation.zh:
‎戒指上刻着“JAS”三个字母
‎是英文名的首字母

translation.en: [Bedoe] Temporary driver's licenses,
translation.zh: ‎还找到一张临时驾照

translation.en: other pieces of identification belonging to other people.
translation.zh: ‎以及其他人的身份证

translation.en: What's he doing with all this?
translation.zh: ‎这些东西他要来干什么？

translation.en: One of the things that we discovered was a crawl space,
translation.zh: ‎我们还在屋里发现了一个架空层

translation.en: and access into it was via a trapdoor in the front closet.
translation.zh: ‎可以通过前面储藏室的活板门进入

translation.en: The water table is pretty high there, so the sump pump was constantly going.
translation.zh:
‎架空层的水位很高
‎所以排水泵一直都在操作

translation.en: I suffer a little bit of claustrophobia, so it affected me going down there,
translation.zh:
‎我有点幽闭恐惧症
‎所以要我下去不容易

translation.en: but I put that aside.
translation.zh: ‎但我决定把恐惧放在一边

translation.en: And what I could see down there was muck, basically.
translation.zh: ‎我只看到下面都是一些污泥

translation.en: Just in case it was a freshly dug grave, we're looking for some…
translation.zh:
‎如果有刚挖过的坟坑
‎那我们就会发现土墩

translation.en: a mound of dirt, but there was no mound.
translation.zh:
‎如果有刚挖过的坟坑
‎那我们就会发现土墩 ‎可是架空层内没有土墩

translation.en: [Bedoe] Nothing was disturbed down there. No body was laying around. No clothing.
translation.zh:
‎地底下没有什么不对劲
‎没看到任何尸体和衣物

translation.en: You don't have a body, you don't have a crime.
translation.zh: ‎没有尸体 罪名就不成立

translation.en: All you have is a missing 15-year-old.
translation.zh: ‎那个15岁少年依然生死未卜

translation.en: So we couldn't charge him, but I said, "We can at least talk to him."
translation.zh:
‎我们不能起诉他
‎但我认为我们起码要盘问他

translation.en: [Gacy] I told him that I had left Nisson's,
translation.zh: ‎我跟他说我离开尼逊药房后

translation.en: and I never seen the boy, and left it at that.
translation.zh: ‎就再也没见过那个孩子

translation.en: I never talked to him.
translation.zh: ‎我说我从没跟他交谈过

translation.en: [Bedoe] Gacy was arrogant.
translation.zh: ‎加西个性骄傲自负

translation.en: Real dismissive.
translation.zh: ‎目中无人

translation.en: He was insulted that we were even asking him stuff like this.
translation.zh: ‎我们找他问话时 他感到受侮辱

translation.en: Gacy was, excuse my language, full of crap.
translation.zh: ‎恕我直言 加西就是个狗屁

translation.en: I mean, he was always boasting himself, how good he was, how rich he was,
translation.zh: ‎他经常吹嘘自己有多出色、有多富有

translation.en: just every context he had.
translation.zh: ‎竭尽所能地炫耀

translation.en: [Gacy] They just kept fucking me around there, playing back and forth, back and forth.
translation.zh: ‎他们一直在耍我 来来回回 往往返返

translation.en: You know? I had given them the statement. What else did they want from me?
translation.zh: ‎我已经做了笔录 他们还想干什么？

translation.en: I says, "You either charge me with something or," I says, "leave me go."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“你们要么起诉我
‎要么放我走”

translation.en: And then that was like, okay, charge him or… or… we le… we let him go.
translation.zh: ‎接着我们要么起诉他 要么放他走

translation.en: We couldn't hold him. We didn't know what happened to Robert Piest.
translation.zh:
‎我们无权扣留他
‎毕竟我们不清楚罗伯特出了什么事

translation.en: But we suspected Gacy had something to do with it.
translation.zh:
‎不过我们仍然怀疑
‎此案与加西脱不了关系

translation.en: And with the criminal sexual conviction in Iowa,
translation.zh:
‎加上他在艾奥瓦州
‎有过鸡奸罪的前科

translation.en: it made us even more suspicious.
translation.zh: ‎让我们更加怀疑他有可能涉案

translation.en: Definitely was worth looking into.
translation.zh: ‎绝对值得我们深入调查

translation.en: [man 4] Waterloo was a great place.
translation.zh: ‎滑铁卢是个好地方

translation.en: Kids rode their bikes.
translation.zh: ‎街上可见小朋友骑着自行车

translation.en: They were out, they moved around, and there was not a lot of crime.
translation.zh: ‎他们来去自如 当地罪案不多

translation.en: You felt safe in the community.
translation.zh: ‎住在小区里感到很安全

translation.en: I came to Waterloo in 1963
translation.zh:
‎1963年 我刚从艾奥瓦州立大学
‎法学院毕业后

translation.en: right out of law school from University of Iowa,
translation.zh: ‎就来到了滑铁卢

translation.en: and I was, uh, hired into a bank as a trust officer.
translation.zh: ‎我获聘到一家银行担任信托官员

translation.en: And very soon became involved in the Waterloo Jaycees.
translation.zh: ‎很快就加入了滑铁卢青年商会

translation.en: And within two years, I ran for president.
translation.zh: ‎两年后 我参与竞选会长一职

translation.en: And, uh, it was during that time that John Gacy came to Waterloo.
translation.zh:
‎约翰·加西也是在同一时期
‎来到滑铁卢

translation.en: [Gacy] Moved to Waterloo, Iowa.
translation.zh: ‎我搬到了艾奥瓦州的滑铁卢镇

translation.en: I was getting into the Jaycees. I was active in the Jaycees.
translation.zh: ‎加入了青年商会 成为活跃的会员

translation.en: [Burger] The Jaycees, during the '60s and '70s and even into the '80s,
translation.zh:
‎在1960年代到1970年代期间
‎乃至于1980年代期间

translation.en: was basically an organization of young men 18 to 35.
translation.zh:
‎青年商会基本上是由一群
‎年龄介于18到35岁的年轻人组成

translation.en: We did some charitable drives.
translation.zh: ‎我们经常主办慈善活动

translation.en: [Burger] And it was just a way for somebody that was young
translation.zh: ‎有意融入当地社区的年轻人

translation.en: to get involved in the community.
translation.zh: ‎参加青年商会就是其中一个管道

translation.en: [Burger] I was first approached by John Gacy in 1966.
translation.zh: ‎约翰·加西是在1966年前来找我

translation.en: And he just came in to say he was interested in becoming a part of the organization.
translation.zh: ‎他一见面就说他有意加入青年商会

translation.en: I knew he was married.
translation.zh: ‎我知道他结了婚

translation.en: [Gacy] Marlynn, we got engaged March 13th of 1964.
translation.zh: ‎我和玛琳在1964年3月13日订婚

translation.en: We didn't get married until September.
translation.zh: ‎同年9月才结婚

translation.en: You know, I enjoyed the first two years of my married life.
translation.zh: ‎新婚头两年 我过得非常开心

translation.en: I was really wrapped into it.
translation.zh: ‎整个人沉浸在幸福之中

translation.en: I just had such a nice, warm feeling,
translation.zh: ‎我感受到一股美好的温暖

translation.en: and I was so happy with her,
translation.zh: ‎我们在一起很幸福

translation.en: and the two kids, Michael and Christine.
translation.zh:
‎我们还有两个孩子
‎迈克尔和克莉丝汀

translation.en: It was like being in church all the time.
translation.zh: ‎我们一家人经常一起去教堂做礼拜

translation.en: When we moved up to Iowa,
translation.zh: ‎我们之所以搬到艾奥瓦州

translation.en: it wasn't that my marriage was falling apart.
translation.zh: ‎不是因为婚姻破裂

translation.en: It was after a year or so with her father, I couldn't handle her father.
translation.zh:
‎只是我和岳父住在一起一年
‎我受不了他

translation.en: [Burger] When John Gacy came to Waterloo,
translation.zh: ‎约翰·加西搬到滑铁卢

translation.en: it was, uh, to manage these Kentucky Fried Chicken franchises that, uh, his father-in-law owned.
translation.zh:
‎是为了经营
‎他岳父旗下的几间肯德基餐厅

translation.en: [Gacy] I could never please my father-in-law.
translation.zh: ‎我的表现永远都无法让我岳父满意

translation.en: My father-in-law comes out in the same image as my dad.
translation.zh: ‎我岳父给我的印象就跟我父亲一样

translation.en: I could never do enough for my dad's acceptance.
translation.zh: ‎我永远得不到我父亲的认同

translation.en: My father-in-law came out the same way.
translation.zh: ‎我岳父也永远不会认同我

translation.en: My dad and I never really got along well while I lived in the house
translation.zh:
‎小时候跟我父亲同住一个屋檐下时
‎我们的感情都很差

translation.en: 'cause I never, I don't know… I guess I… I never lived up to his standards.
translation.zh: ‎因为我永远无法达到他要的高度

translation.en: [Burger] John was always viewed as pushy. I… I think that's a fair statement.
translation.zh:
‎大家都认为约翰是个性格急躁的人
‎我觉得这个说法很贴切

translation.en: And there were some who didn't like that. There were some who didn't care.
translation.zh: ‎有的人不喜欢 有的人则不放在眼里

translation.en: One particular trait always stood out was
translation.zh: ‎他有个难以忽视的习惯

translation.en: he drove fast everywhere he went.
translation.zh: ‎那就是他开车很快

translation.en: And nobody liked to ride with him.
translation.zh: ‎没人喜欢坐他开的车

translation.en: I mean, it was like he was headed to a fire every time he got in the car.
translation.zh: ‎他每次开车就想要去救火一样

translation.en: I don't know where he was headed
translation.zh: ‎我不知道他赶着去哪里

translation.en: and I don't even know if he knew where he was headed,
translation.zh: ‎也不清楚他知不知道自己要去哪里

translation.en: but it was…
translation.zh: ‎但是…

translation.en: He obviously had some drive.
translation.zh: ‎这说明了他存有某种欲望

translation.en: [man 5] I was 18 years old in 1967.
I was a student at Ellsworth Community College
translation.zh: ‎当年我还是埃尔斯沃思社区学院

translation.en: in Iowa Falls, Iowa.
translation.zh: ‎学校位于艾奥瓦福尔斯

translation.en: I rode to school with two other guys that lived in Waterloo.
translation.zh:
‎我平日跟另外两个同学一起开车上学
‎他们都住在滑铁卢

translation.en: One particular night in January of 1967,
translation.zh: ‎1967年1月的某个晚上

translation.en: uh, I got picked up at my home.
translation.zh: ‎他们到我家接我

translation.en: And one of those, uh, boys that I went back to school with
translation.zh: ‎其中一个同学

translation.en: worked at one of the local Kentucky Fried Chicken places.
translation.zh: ‎在当地一间肯德基餐厅打工

translation.en: And he had said he had to stop by the Kentucky Fried Chicken and pick up his check
translation.zh: ‎他说他要到肯德基餐厅领薪水后

translation.en: prior to us driving back to Iowa Falls.
translation.zh: ‎才一起开车回去艾奥瓦福尔斯

translation.en: That's when I first met John Gacy.
translation.zh: ‎那是我第一次见到约翰·加西

translation.en: He seemed very personable, very friendly.
translation.zh: ‎他看起来温文儒雅 待人非常友善

translation.en: Um, but nothing remarkable to describe him at the time.
translation.zh: ‎但我当时对他并没有什么印象

translation.en: While we're there,
translation.zh: ‎走进肯德基餐厅后

translation.en: John Gacy was telling these two guys that, "Hey, you should come to my house."
translation.zh:
‎约翰·加西跟这两个同学说：
‎“不如你们到我家玩吧”

translation.en: He said, "My wife and my son are out of town. They're in Chicago."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“我太太和儿子都出城去了
‎他们都在芝加哥

translation.en: He says, "Why don't you come over to my house and we can play some pool
translation.zh:
‎不如你们到我家来玩
‎我们可以打台球

translation.en: and… and do some drinking and stuff."
translation.zh: ‎喝酒作乐什么的”

translation.en: John Gacy's house was just a normal house
translation.zh: ‎约翰·加西的房子没什么特别

translation.en: in a, you know, middle-class suburb of Waterloo.
translation.zh: ‎就是滑铁卢中产小区常见的房子

translation.en: He had a basement that was, uh, fixed up.
translation.zh: ‎他有个装修过的地下室

translation.en: It had a… a bar, a built-in bar down there.
translation.zh: ‎里面有一个内置吧台

translation.en: It had a nice pool table.
translation.zh: ‎以及一个像样的台球桌

translation.en: We started playing pool, and I was, at the time, a very good pool player,
translation.zh:
‎我们开始打台球
‎当时我打台球的技术挺好的

translation.en: and I was beating him every game.
translation.zh: ‎场场都打败他

translation.en: [Nemmers] And at one point, he asked if I wanted to play for money,
translation.zh: ‎期间他问我要不要赌球

translation.en: and I said, "Certainly."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好啊”

translation.en: And so we started playing pool for a dollar a game.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们就开始赌一场一美元

translation.en: He also mentioned to me that he was originally from the Chicago area
translation.zh: ‎期间他也提到他来自芝加哥

translation.en: and that he had lots of connections in Chicago.
translation.zh: ‎在芝加哥的人脉很广

translation.en: He told me that he was, uh, personal friends with the mayor of Chicago
translation.zh: ‎他跟我说他跟芝加哥市长是私交

translation.en: and also with the chief of police in Chicago.
translation.zh: ‎还说他也认识芝加哥警局局长

translation.en: All along the walls, there were these certificates framed and hanging on the walls.
translation.zh: ‎墙上挂满了裱好的证书

translation.en: One particular, um, certificate
translation.zh: ‎其中一张证书

translation.en: was from the Illinois Governor's Board of Sex and Health.
translation.zh: ‎出自艾奥瓦州性健康教育委员会

translation.en: And he told me that he was on a… a board that studied homosexuals.
translation.zh:
‎他跟我说
‎他是某个同性恋研究会的会员

translation.en: [Gacy] There's three types of sexes.
translation.zh: ‎人有三种性倾向

translation.en: There's heterosexual,
translation.zh: ‎异性恋

translation.en: there is homosexual,
translation.zh: ‎同性恋

translation.en: and there's bisexual.
translation.zh: ‎以及双性恋

translation.en: You know, you can't take the clinical definition and apply it to me
translation.zh:
‎你们不能把临床医学的定义
‎套在我身上

translation.en: because I don't think that way.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我并不是那么想的

translation.en: A heterosexual is one who's in love with the opposite sex.
translation.zh:
‎异性恋是指

translation.zh:
‎我是他的拍档
‎我们俩负责从半夜到中午跟踪他

translation.en: [Sullivan] The police were supposed to be undercover,
translation.zh: ‎警方本来不想打草惊蛇

translation.en: but it didn't take him but a day to realize that we were following him.
translation.zh: ‎只是他隔天就意识到自己被我们跟踪

translation.en: At that stage, then we have to try to change our tactics.
translation.zh: ‎到了那个阶段 我们不得不更换策略

translation.en: [man 6] And we decided that it would put a lot more psychological pressure on Gacy
translation.zh: ‎我们认为如果公开监视他

translation.en: if we did an overt type of surveillance.
translation.zh: ‎也许能给他施加更多心理压力

translation.en: And an overt surveillance is where you knock on the individual's door,
translation.zh:
‎所谓“空开监视行动”
‎是指去敲当事人的家门

translation.en: introduce yourself and tell him that you're the police
translation.zh: ‎跟当事人介绍自己是警察

translation.en: and that you're gonna be following him 24 hours a day, seven days a week,
translation.zh:
‎并告知对方
‎警方会一连七天全天候监视他

translation.en: every place that they go.
translation.zh: ‎跟踪他

translation.en: [Albrecht] The first public place he went into was the Moose Lodge in Des Plaines.
translation.zh:
‎得知被警察跟踪后
‎他去的第一个公共场合是驼鹿小筑

translation.en: And when Gacy walked in, people just… "John's here!"
translation.zh:
‎加西一走进门
‎所有人都说：“约翰到了！”

translation.en: They gravitated towards him. "How you doing, John? Great to see you!"
translation.zh:
‎他们都簇拥上去问候他：
‎“约翰 最近好吗？很高兴见到你”

translation.en: Kind of the life of the party. That happened quite frequently.
translation.zh:
‎场面挺热闹的
‎跟踪他期间 这种场景挺常见的

translation.en: [Amirante] He seemed to welcome the investigation.
translation.zh: ‎他似乎并不排斥警方的监视行动

translation.en: He welcomed the… the jousting, the back and forth with the police.
translation.zh: ‎他很乐意跟警方你来我往地角力

translation.en: [Gacy] Constantly, I was under surveillance.
translation.zh: ‎我一直被警方监视

translation.en: I could have ditched 'em any one of a number of times and gotten away,
translation.zh: ‎我可以随时随地甩开他们的

translation.en: but I was constantly stopping and trying to help them, you know?
translation.zh: ‎可是我一直停下来帮助他们

translation.en: They were slowing me down. He said, "Well, goddamn, you never stop."
translation.zh:
‎有时候他们叫我慢下来
‎有个警探说：“天啊 你老忙个不停”

translation.en: I said, "Well, I got things to do."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“我有很多事要忙

translation.en: I said, "I got a job going in Aurora, Illinois."
translation.zh: ‎我在伊利诺伊州奥罗拉城有个活

translation.en: "I've got one in Waukegan, Illinois. I've got three in Chicago."
translation.zh:
‎在伊利诺伊州沃基根城有个活
‎在芝加哥有三个活”

translation.en: And I says, "It takes time, and I've got to move around all of them."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“这些活需要时间完成
‎所以我只能到处奔波”

translation.en: [Amirante] He was playing a… a cat and mouse game
translation.zh: ‎他在跟警方玩猫抓老鼠的游戏

translation.en: with the police department, trying to outfox them,
translation.zh: ‎他在跟警方玩猫抓老鼠的游戏 ‎想要以以计谋胜过警方

translation.en: trying to manipulate what they were doing,
translation.zh: ‎想要操控警方的行动

translation.en: trying to show that he was in control of this situation.
translation.zh: ‎想要彰显他才是掌控局势的人

translation.en: [Robinson] One way that John could kinda get even with us for following him
translation.zh:
‎跟踪约翰期间
‎我们发现他有个能力跟我们旗鼓相当

translation.en: was driving like a maniac.
translation.zh: ‎他是飙车狂人

translation.en: John would test our driving abilities every day
translation.zh: ‎约翰天天都在测试我们的开车技术

translation.en: going up and down side streets.
translation.zh: ‎他会经常往返小路

translation.en: He would be doing 40, 50 miles an hour on these side streets.
translation.zh:
‎他会以每小时60到80公里的车速
‎在小路上行驶

translation.en: And when we would get on, like, the Kennedy Expressway,
translation.zh: ‎开上肯尼迪高速公路时

translation.en: there were many times where, in trying to keep up with John,
translation.zh: ‎我们有好多次必须设法跟上约翰

translation.en: we would have to ride on the shoulder of the road,
translation.zh: ‎有时我们还要动用紧急车道

translation.en: either on the inside of the Kennedy or the outside of the Kennedy,
translation.zh: ‎无论是在隧道之内 还是隧道之外

translation.en: just trying to keep up with him.
translation.zh: ‎我们都要想尽办法跟上他

translation.en: We're gonna stay with you all the time.
translation.zh: ‎我们全天候跟踪他

translation.en: If he went into a coffee shop for coffee,
translation.zh: ‎如果约翰走进一家咖啡馆喝咖啡

translation.en: we went in with John and sat with him and had coffee.
translation.zh:
‎我们也会跟着进去
‎跟他坐在一起喝咖啡

translation.en: If he went into a bar, we went into the bar with him.
translation.zh:
‎如果他走进一家酒吧
‎我们也会跟着进去

translation.en: [Albrecht] During these stops at restaurants, we had quite long conversations with Gacy.
translation.zh:
‎在餐厅逗留期间
‎我们和加西聊了很长时间

translation.en: People started seeing us there all the time with Gacy,
translation.zh:
‎越来越多人看到
‎我们和加西一起出入公共场合

translation.en: and so Gacy would, uh, describe us as the FBI trying to get some kind of drug case on him.
translation.zh:
‎加西会跟旁人说联邦调查局
‎想从他身上取得贩毒情报

translation.en: A couple places he went, he described us as his bodyguards.
translation.zh:
‎他还跟好几个地方的人说
‎我们是他的保镖

translation.en: But he also told us that he had hired people to follow us
translation.zh:
‎期间他也跟我们透露
‎他也请了人跟踪我们

translation.en: to watch us,
translation.zh: ‎监视我们

translation.en: and if he gave the sign, they were gonna take us out.
translation.zh: ‎只要他打个手势 后者就会攻击我们

translation.en: So, uh, we were aware that Gacy was full of himself.
translation.zh: ‎当下我们就知道加西是个自大狂

translation.en: One time, he told us that he had heard that Rob Piest was found up in, uh, Wisconsin
translation.zh:
‎有一次 他说他听说有人
‎在威斯康星州找到罗伯特·皮斯特

translation.en: and he was all right.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特还好好的

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] Rob would never run away.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特是不可能离家出走的

translation.en: There was something wrong.
translation.zh: ‎肯定有什么不对劲

translation.en: The police came to visit me at school with the Piest family
translation.zh:
‎警察曾经带着皮斯特的家人
‎到学校来找我

translation.en: to see, you know, what did Rob say and, um, where was he going.
translation.zh:
‎他们想知道罗伯特失踪前说过什么
‎想知道他去了哪里

translation.en: And I explained that Rob said he was going outside to talk to the contractor about a job.
translation.zh:
‎我解释说 那天罗伯特说
‎他要出去跟那个承包商谈一个活

translation.en: They told me later that the contractor denied all that,
translation.zh:
‎后来他们跟我说
‎那个承包商否认这点

translation.en: that I was lying, and he never talked to that boy about getting a job.
translation.zh:
‎对方说我撒谎
‎他从来没找过罗伯特谈差事

translation.en: I was so angry 'cause I never lie.
translation.zh:
‎我知道后很生气
‎因为我这个人不会说谎

translation.en: [Bedoe] I was working with the Des Plaines police, but I wasn't a member.
translation.zh:
‎当时我在替德斯普兰斯市办事
‎但我不是那边的警察

translation.en: I was the investigator with the Cook County Sheriff's Dept.
translation.zh: ‎我其实是库克县警局的警探

translation.en: assigned to the State's Attorney's office.
translation.zh: ‎只是被派往州检察署办事

translation.en: I was like an in-between guy.
translation.zh: ‎我的身份就像个中间人

translation.en: Fortunately, I could do whatever I wanted to, uh, most of the time because of my position.
translation.zh:
‎基于我的岗位
‎很多时候我都有幸去做我想做的事

translation.en: If something needed to be investigated, I did it.
translation.zh: ‎如果需要我查案 我就去做

translation.en: I didn't have to get permission from anybody. I just went out and did it.
translation.zh:
‎我不需要得到任何人的许可
‎我可以自行动身去做 ‎（约翰·维恩·加西
‎于伊利诺伊州获假释）

translation.en: We looked at his rap sheet. He had other arrests.
translation.zh:
‎我们查看他的前科
‎他有好几次被警方逮捕

translation.en: But they didn't jump off the rap sheet as being sexually related.
translation.zh: ‎只是这些罪行看似都与性侵无关

translation.en: A lot of times, they were, like, disorderly conduct or battery or whatever.
translation.zh: ‎大都是妨害治安行为、殴打行为等等

translation.en: You know, they didn't really go into the detail of he was soliciting a kid for sex.
translation.zh:
‎上面没有提到
‎他诱导未成年少年进行性行为

translation.en: You know, those details weren't there.
translation.zh: ‎这些细节都不在上面

translation.en: [Amirante] Gacy was part of that powerful Democratic Party.
translation.zh:
‎民主党势力强大
‎当时加西是民主党的一分子

translation.en: You don't think a phone call could have been made to the local police department,
translation.zh: ‎我们想不到有人会打给警局说

translation.en: saying, "Leave this guy alone. He's, uh, a decent… He's a good guy."
translation.zh:
‎“别去骚扰这个人
‎他是正人君子 他是好人”

translation.en: "He's a good guy." And that's how Cook County used to work back then.
translation.zh:
‎“别去骚扰这个人
‎他是正人君子 他是好人” ‎以前库克县是这么操作的

translation.en: And, you know, people were looking down at… at gay kids at the time, gay young men.
translation.zh:
‎那个年代
‎同性恋少年和年轻人都受到歧视

translation.en: You think the police were about to listen to the gay guy that came in
translation.zh: ‎如果一个男同性恋去跟警方举报加西

translation.en: and… and beefed about Gacy, who everybody knew,
translation.zh:
‎你们说警方会信吗？
‎加西可是有头有脸的人

translation.en: and, you know, he was… he was friends with everybody?
translation.zh: ‎他的人脉很广

translation.en: [Tovar] Gacy's choice for workers was always young men,
translation.zh: ‎加西经常挑年轻小伙子替他干活

translation.en: small in stature,
translation.zh: ‎他们体格偏瘦

translation.en: usually light-colored hair.
translation.zh: ‎通常都是金发男子

translation.en: [Amirante] The two main guys that we encountered was Mike Rossi
translation.zh:
‎我们注意到了另外两个年轻人
‎分别是迈克尔·罗西

translation.en: and David Cram.
translation.zh: ‎以及大卫·克拉姆

translation.en: Michael Rossi and David Cram were Gacy's assistants at PDM Contractors
translation.zh:
‎迈克尔·罗西和大卫·克拉姆
‎是加西在PDM公司的助手

translation.en: who worked very closely with him in everything he did.
translation.zh: ‎他们的工作关系非常密切

translation.en: But they were basically his little…
translation.zh: ‎但他们只是约翰的小…

translation.en: They were gofers, and they would help him running the business, they'd help him run his business.
translation.zh: ‎他们都是替他跑腿的杂工

translation.en: [Sullivan] As we're going through the investigation
translation.zh: ‎调查期间

translation.en: and we talk to people and find out that,
translation.zh: ‎我们访问其他人时发现了一件事

translation.en: "Yeah, there's a kid by the name of such-and-such."
translation.zh: ‎他们说：“有个叫什么名字的年轻人

translation.en: "He worked for Gacy at a time. I haven't seen him in a while."
translation.zh:
‎曾经替加西打工
‎有好一阵子没见到他了”

translation.en: And then we got, uh… people started coming… coming forward, saying,
translation.zh: ‎接着有人开始出面透露

translation.en: you know, "I know this guy. He worked there. He's missing too."
translation.zh:
‎“我认识这个家伙
‎他以前在那家公司打工 他也失踪了”

translation.en: Gregory Godzik was a Chicago boy.
translation.zh:
‎格雷戈里·戈奇克
‎是一个来自芝加哥的少年

translation.en: He had worked for Gacy,
translation.zh: ‎他曾经替加西打工

translation.en: and, uh, he turned up missing.
translation.zh: ‎他失踪了

translation.en: [Bedoe] And then, we… we find out that another kid that used to work for Gacy,
translation.zh:
‎接着我们发现
‎另一个曾经替加西打工的少年

translation.en: he's up and disappeared.
translation.zh: ‎也失踪了

translation.en: John Butkovich one day didn't show up for work. Nobody ever saw him again.
translation.zh:
‎约翰·布特科维奇某天突然没来上班
‎从此再也没人见过他

translation.en: The police came by asking questions. You know, nothing.
translation.zh: ‎警察找过他问话 毫无结论

translation.en: Gacy denied knowing anything about the kid's disappearance.
translation.zh:
‎加西一概否认
‎他说他不知道那个少年失踪了

translation.en: [Tovar] The class ring that had the initials JS
translation.zh: ‎当初搜查加西的住所时

translation.en: that we found in Gacy's house during the search warrant
translation.zh:
‎我们在屋里发现一枚
‎刻着“JS”两个首字母的毕业戒指

translation.en: turned out to belong to a young man named John Szyc.
translation.zh:
‎那枚戒指原来属于
‎一个叫约翰·席克的少年

translation.en: And had lived in Des Plaines, but, uh, had moved into the city.
translation.zh:
‎他曾经住在德斯普兰斯市
‎后来搬到芝加哥市居住

translation.en: Uh, we contacted his parents,
translation.zh: ‎我们联系上他的父母

translation.en: and his mother told us that he had been missing for a while.
translation.zh: ‎他母亲说儿子已经失踪好一阵子了

translation.en: [Bedoe] John Szyc's car was never recovered when he disappeared.
translation.zh:
‎约翰·席克连人带车一起失踪
‎他的车并未被寻获

translation.en: And then, during the course of the investigation,
translation.zh: ‎调查期间

translation.en: when I got the information from Szyc's parents what car he'd been driving,
translation.zh: ‎我们取得了席克私家车的款型资料

translation.en: one of the guys, might've been Tovar said,
translation.zh: ‎其中一个好像叫托瓦尔的同事说

translation.en: "That's the same kind of car that Mike Rossi's driving."
translation.zh: ‎“跟迈克尔·罗西开的是同一款车”

translation.en: The VIN number was altered.
translation.zh: ‎只是车辆识别代号换了

translation.en: And then Gacy sold it to Rossi for, you know, pennies on the dollar.
translation.zh: ‎加西已经把那辆车便宜卖给了罗西

translation.en: [Robinson] That put John in contact, or knowing, four or five different people
translation.zh:
‎如此一来 我们得知约翰
‎跟四五个失踪者都有关联

translation.en: who had come up missing that had never been located.
translation.zh: ‎这些人当时还未被寻获

translation.en: This is highly unusual.
translation.zh: ‎这是非常不寻常的情况

translation.en: I mean, most people don't know any missing peop… person,
translation.zh: ‎普通人很少会认识失踪者

translation.en: let alone coming to know four or five.
translation.zh: ‎同时认识四五个失踪者更不寻常

translation.en: [Sullivan] All of these things were going on at the same time.
translation.zh: ‎这些情报同时涌现

translation.en: We were suspecting a bad outcome.
translation.zh: ‎我们怀疑他们凶多吉少了

translation.en: But we also knew that we didn't have any bodies.
translation.zh:
‎但我们也很清楚
‎我们还没找到任何尸体

translation.en: [Bedoe] Why are these people vanishing, never to be found or seen again?
translation.zh:
‎这些人怎么会消失了？
‎他们为什么没再出现？

translation.en: Bodies never discovered.
translation.zh: ‎他们的尸体都未被寻获

translation.en: You're scratching your head, you're going, "What happened? They just vanished."
translation.zh:
‎我们挠头不解
‎“这究竟什么情况？他们凭空消失了

translation.en: "Never turned up. Where did they go?"
translation.zh: ‎再也没有出现 他们到底去了哪里？”

translation.en: [Sullivan] You know, "When does this end? What have we got here?"
translation.zh:
‎我们自问：“这要查到什么时候？
‎这究竟是什么情况？”

translation.en: 'Cause truly, we didn't know.
translation.zh: ‎说真的 我们当时真的不知道

translation.en: [Bedoe] The scary part was that his attorneys had run down to the federal court
translation.zh:
‎更可怕的是
‎他的代表律师竟然跑到联邦法院

translation.en: and applied for a federal injunction against the State's Attorney's office
translation.zh: ‎就州检察署和德斯普兰斯市警局

translation.en: and the Des Plaines Police Department.
translation.zh: ‎申请联邦禁制令

translation.en: [Amirante] Leroy Stevens, who was his civil lawyer for his company at the time, and I
translation.zh:
‎当时勒罗伊·史蒂文斯
‎是加西本人和其公司的民事诉讼律师

translation.en: were in the midst of preparing a federal lawsuit
translation.zh: ‎他们准备引用联邦法律

translation.en: against the Des Plaines Police Department
translation.zh: ‎控告德斯普兰斯市警局

translation.en: um, to enjoin them from, uh, harassing Gacy.
translation.zh:
‎谴责后者的跟踪行为
‎给加西造成了困扰

translation.en: And really ruining his business
translation.zh: ‎导致他生意蒙受亏损

translation.en: because they were following him so closely and violating his civil rights.
translation.zh: ‎导致他生意蒙受亏损 ‎甚至侵犯了他的民权

translation.en: Terry Sullivan, who was the prosecutor, was playing it close to the vest.
translation.zh:
‎当时的检察官是特里·沙利文
‎对此案三缄其口

translation.en: The police department was playing it close to the vest. We couldn't get information.
translation.zh:
‎警方也对调查工作三缄其口
‎我们无法取得任何情报

translation.en: The only way we'd get to the bottom of it was file the lawsuit.
translation.zh:
‎要得知他们调查他的目的
‎唯一的办法是指控他们

translation.en: [Bedoe] If he gets that injunction approved, that's the end of it.
translation.zh: ‎万一禁制令通过了 那就没戏唱了

translation.en: We'd have to back off altogether.
translation.zh: ‎我们只能退下来

translation.en: Can't interview him, his employees, nothing.
translation.zh:
‎不能找他和他的职员问话
‎什么都做不了

translation.en: So yeah, time was of the essence. There's no question about it.
translation.zh: ‎时间是关键 这点毋庸置疑

translation.en: [Amirante] You have to understand that, at the time,
translation.zh: ‎你们要明白 那个时候

translation.en: Leroy and I really truly believed Gacy was innocent.
translation.zh: ‎我和勒罗伊坚信加西是无辜的

translation.en: Terry Sullivan eventually told me about the case that John had in Iowa,
translation.zh:
‎后来特里·沙利文终于肯向我透露
‎约翰在艾奥瓦州有前科

translation.en: which was a sodomy case, which, you know, I was shocked that he had that
translation.zh:
‎也就是曾犯下鸡奸罪
‎我听了大吃一惊

translation.en: 'cause no… who expected Gacy, this guy who was the precinct captain,
translation.zh: ‎谁会想到加西 堂堂一个选区区长

translation.en: to have been convicted of sodomy? Nobody knew that.
translation.zh: ‎曾经犯下鸡奸罪？这事没人知道

translation.en: [Gacy] I was sentenced to Fort Madison, Iowa, which was a penitentiary,
translation.zh: ‎我被判在艾奥瓦州麦迪逊堡服刑

translation.en: but then they revised it and said
translation.zh: ‎后来法官决定改判

translation.en: that since I was a first offender and I was still under 26,
translation.zh: ‎原因是我是初犯 加上我还不到26岁

translation.en: that I should be sent to the men's reformatory at Anamosa.
translation.zh: ‎应该被送去位于阿纳莫萨城的管教所

translation.en: I was sent there. I was scared to death.
translation.zh:
‎后来我真被送去了那间管教所
‎当时我怕得要命

translation.en: Again, never being arrested before,
translation.zh: ‎我再说一遍 那是我第一次被逮捕

translation.en: never being in jail before, didn't know what the hell…
translation.zh: ‎也是第一次坐牢 我对监狱一无所知

translation.en: I thought I was gonna get killed in there.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为我会在死在里面

translation.en: ♪ O come let us adore him ♪
translation.zh:
‎（阿纳莫萨管教所的圣诞节
‎1969年新闻特辑）

translation.en: ♪ O come let us adore him ♪
translation.zh:
‎（阿纳莫萨管教所的圣诞节
‎1969年新闻特辑） ‎（德斯普兰斯市 WHO电视台）

translation.en: …I got into it and organized myself.
translation.zh:
‎结果我竟然跟狱友们打成一片
‎也重拾自信

translation.en: I went in there with a positive attitude.
translation.zh: ‎我带着正面的心态融入那个地方

translation.en: And, uh, I became not only popular, but powerful.
translation.zh:
‎我不仅成为狱中的大红人
‎也成为有地位的人

translation.en: Hello, I'm John Gacy. I'm from Waterloo, Iowa.
translation.zh:
‎大家好 我是约翰·加西
‎来自艾奥瓦州滑铁卢市

translation.en: [man 7] And you're a man of some authority here. What's your title?
translation.zh:
‎看来你在这里是个有点地位的人
‎请问你担任什么岗位？

translation.en: Well, I'm first cook in the kitchen,
translation.zh: ‎我是厨房的主厨

translation.en: and I run the, uh, the morning meal and the afternoon meal in the kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎负责在厨房里准备早午饭

translation.en: Food was a… was an avenue of power
translation.zh: ‎在管教所里 膳食是取得权力的通道

translation.en: is… is I guess that's how I would describe it,
translation.zh:
‎在管教所里 膳食是取得权力的通道 ‎我是这么形容的
‎膳食是取得权力的通道

translation.en: would be an avenue of power.
translation.zh:
‎我是这么形容的
‎膳食是取得权力的通道

translation.en: And John used it relentlessly.
translation.zh: ‎约翰用得乐此不疲

translation.en: Screw with John Gacy
translation.zh: ‎得罪约翰·加西的人

translation.en: and you better start taking your meals somewhere else
translation.zh: ‎最好还是到别的地方要饭

translation.en: because you had to assume that you're gonna get something like,
translation.zh: ‎因为这个人要假定他下一餐是…

translation.en: for lack of a better description,
translation.zh: ‎我找不到更贴切的形容了

translation.en: mouse turds in your… in your food the next time you come through
translation.zh: ‎他下一餐将会是一坨老鼠屎

translation.en: because you didn't do what he said.
translation.zh: ‎只因为他不听加西的话

translation.en: [Gacy] Without force, I controlled the kitchen,
translation.zh: ‎我在无需动用武力下控制了整个厨房

translation.en: and there was some 55 inmates in the kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎当时有55个狱友在厨房做事

translation.en: But I never yield to anybody.
translation.zh: ‎但我从不屈服于他人之下

translation.en: [Cornell] The other thing, of course, was the… the Jaycees,
translation.zh: ‎青年商会是他另一个地盘

translation.en: and that's how I met him.
translation.zh: ‎我们就是通过青年商会认识的

translation.en: I'm sitting there reading or something,
translation.zh: ‎某天我坐在一旁阅读

translation.en: and he said, "Hi, I'm John Gacy, and, uh, I'm recruiting for the Jaycees."
translation.zh:
‎他走前来说：“你好 我是约翰·加西
‎正在为青年商会招募会员”

translation.en: I didn't even know what the hell the Jaycees was at that point.
translation.zh: ‎当时我对青年商会毫无概念

translation.en: By halfway through the time that we were there,
translation.zh:
‎我们经营管教所青年商会分会
‎好一阵子后

translation.en: say toward the end of 1969,
translation.zh: ‎应该是在1969年下半年

translation.en: that was one of the largest Jaycee chapters
translation.zh: ‎我们为艾奥瓦州青年商会史册

translation.en: in the entire state of Iowa,
translation.zh: ‎写下最风光的篇章

translation.en: largely due to the recruiting efforts of John Gacy.
translation.zh:
‎这都要归功于
‎约翰·加西积极招募会员

translation.en: …at the Anamosa Men's Reformatory.
translation.zh:
‎我获阿纳莫萨管教所颁发
‎年度最佳青年奖

translation.en: I built the first miniature golf course inside the walls of a reformatory.
translation.zh:
‎我在管教所范围内成功打造了
‎第一个迷你高尔夫球场

translation.en: [Cornell] This is an example of the man's abilities and talent.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个多才多艺青年的范例

translation.en: I think you could make a case that there was a good John and a bad John.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以说他的内心里
‎有个“好约翰”和“坏约翰”

translation.en: I knew the good John.
translation.zh: ‎我认识的是那个“好约翰”

translation.en: I had glimpses of other things.
translation.zh: ‎我看到了他其他面向

translation.en: [Gacy] The weak do not survive in prison.
translation.zh: ‎弱者无法在监狱里生存

translation.en: You either come under, uh, the ruling of… of some gang
translation.zh: ‎要么服从于某个党派之下

translation.en: or… or some other forceful inmate.
translation.zh: ‎要么屈服于其他较强大的狱友之下

translation.en: You do what he says, otherwise you get the shit kicked out of you.
translation.zh:
‎凡事都要照着老大的话去做
‎不然就会遭到毒打

translation.en: Well, I would not bow to any of that shit
translation.zh: ‎我绝不屈膝于他人之下

translation.en: because nobody will ever lead me.
translation.zh: ‎因为我从来不是任何人的手下

translation.en: He was walking on the range that he lived in, over in the south house,
translation.zh: ‎有一次他所待的南翼走动

translation.en: and he saw one inmate performing fellatio on another inmate in a cell,
translation.zh: ‎看到有个囚犯给另一个囚犯口交

translation.en: and just simply walked over, and kicked the guy in the face four times,
translation.zh:
‎他就随便走过去
‎在那个囚犯脸上踹了四脚

translation.en: and basically broke his jaw.
translation.zh: ‎对方的下巴都被他踹断了

translation.en: He's struggling with his sexual urges toward homosexuals.
translation.zh: ‎他在压抑着他对同性的欲望

translation.en: That came out in his, in my opinion…
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 这股压抑…

translation.en: That came out in his personality as anger, as rage.
translation.zh: ‎最终以愤怒的形式体现出来

translation.en: [man 7] How long have you been here?
translation.zh: ‎约翰 你在管教所里待了多久？

translation.en: I've been here now a year and about two weeks.
translation.zh: ‎我在这里待了一年又两个星期

translation.en: [man 7] You mind my asking how long do you plan to take up residence here?
translation.zh: ‎介意我问你打算住在这里多久吗？

translation.en: Well, I hope to be getting out sometime in May.
translation.zh: ‎我希望能在5月获得释放

translation.en: [man 7] Well, good. Yes. You gonna continue as a cook, use that as a profession, do you think?
translation.zh: ‎很好 你打算继续当厨师吗？

translation.en: Right. This is my profession before I came in.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 我进来之前就是个厨师

translation.en: -[man 7] All right. -Food service.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-从事餐饮业

translation.en: [Cornell] It was Christmastime.
translation.zh: ‎当时正值圣诞季

translation.en: We were deeply involved in the Toys for Tots project.
translation.zh: ‎我们积极参与“给孩子送玩具”的活动

translation.en: We were deeply involved with the Christmas banquet for the Jaycees.
translation.zh:
‎我们也积极参与
‎青年商会圣诞晚宴的筹备工作

translation.en: A lot was going on.
translation.zh: ‎当时要处理的事很多

translation.en: But then, John's… [clears throat]
translation.zh: ‎可是就在那个时候 约翰的…

translation.en: …John's father died.
translation.zh: ‎约翰的父亲过世了

translation.en: [Gacy] December 18th, my dad went in the hospital in Chicago
translation.zh:
‎12月18日
‎我爸爸被送进芝加哥的一家医院

translation.en: and I was never told of it.
translation.zh: ‎可是没人通知我

translation.en: My dad died December 25th, Christmas Day.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸在12月25日圣诞节当天过世

translation.en: They didn't tell me until after my dad was buried that he died.
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸下葬后
‎才得知我爸爸已经过世的消息

translation.en: Even after going to the joint for… for this sodomy conviction and all that,
translation.zh: ‎约翰因鸡奸罪被判坐牢后

translation.en: his father was still alive.
translation.zh: ‎他爸爸还活着

translation.en: John had the option at some point in time of trying to mend that fence.
translation.zh: ‎他其实还来得及跟他父亲和好

translation.en: But not after that.
translation.zh: ‎但他再也没有这个机会

translation.en: It was over. It was done.
translation.zh: ‎没了 一切都结束了

translation.en: I don't recall ever hearing him laugh very much after that.
translation.zh:
‎印象中 他父亲过世后
‎他就很少露出笑容了

translation.en: [Gacy] What I'm doing is just telling what my dad always told me, is I'm weak.
translation.zh:
‎我所做的一切只是证明了
‎我父亲所说的话是对的 我是懦夫

translation.en: Just a dumb, stupid kid. Can't do nothing.
translation.zh: ‎是个蠢货 是个傻子 软弱无能

translation.en: Yeah, he was right about a lot of things. I let him down when he died.
translation.zh:
‎没错 很多事都被他说中了
‎他死的时候 我令他失望了

translation.en: [Cornell] Most of the people who were serving ten-year sentences
translation.zh: ‎大部分被判十年有期徒刑的囚犯

translation.en: would serve around two years.
translation.zh: ‎服刑两年后就被放出来了

translation.en: But because of who we were and what we did inside,
translation.zh: ‎但由于我和约翰在管教所的成就斐然

translation.en: John and I got out in 18 months.
translation.zh:
‎我们被关了仅仅18个月
‎就被释放出来了

translation.en: So he and I basically left, uh, that, uh, second week in July,
translation.zh: ‎我们俩是在7月的第二个星期离开的

translation.en: and, uh, we shook hands and walked away.
translation.zh: ‎我们互相握手 从此分道扬镳

translation.en: [Robinson] By being with John everywhere all the time,
translation.zh: ‎无时无处地跟踪约翰

translation.en: we were trying to break him down.
translation.zh: ‎目的是要击溃他的心理防线

translation.en: I mean, I think that you can be the most law-abiding citizen in the entire world
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 再怎么奉公守法的好市民

translation.en: and you still would not want the police to be following you
translation.zh: ‎也不会喜欢被警察监视

translation.en: 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.zh: ‎况且是一连七天全天候被警察跟踪

translation.en: [Albrecht] As it went along
translation.zh:
‎随着调查日益深入 ‎警探开始找
‎认识加西的熟人和友人问话

translation.en: and the investigators were interviewing Gacy contacts, Gacy's friends,
translation.zh:
‎警探开始找
‎认识加西的熟人和友人问话

translation.en: I think some friends started realizing there's something more to this.
translation.zh:
‎有些友人
‎也开始隐隐意识到事情不简单

translation.en: I feel we were all that Gacy had left to talk to.
translation.zh: ‎只有加西欠我们一个真相

translation.en: Nobody else wanted much to do with him.
translation.zh: ‎其他人都不想跟他扯上关系

translation.en: [Robinson] In some ways, I think John began to think that we were his best friends.
translation.zh:
‎我认为约翰或多或少产生
‎我们是他好朋友的错觉

translation.en: We weren't giving him a hard time, only following him.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是跟踪他 并没有为难过他

translation.en: [Robinson] Many times, he invited us in, trying to show what a nice guy he was
translation.zh:
‎他有好几次邀请我们进去他家做客
‎想要彰显他友好亲切的一面

translation.en: and how amiable he was with us, and it got us into the house.
translation.zh:
‎他有好几次邀请我们进去他家做客
‎想要彰显他友好亲切的一面 ‎我们还真进了他的家

translation.en: We had gotten a request from Lieutenant Kozenczak.
translation.zh: ‎我们收到了科森恰克督察的指示

translation.en: There were a missing TV and a missing radio from a missing person.
translation.zh:
‎其中一名失踪少年
‎不见了一台电视机和一台收音机

translation.en: [Tovar] John Szyc's mother told us
translation.zh: ‎约翰·席克的母亲透露

translation.en: that a little TV that he had in his bedroom was missing from his house.
translation.zh: ‎她儿子房里有一台小型电视机不见了

translation.en: She described it as a Motorola type TV,
translation.zh: ‎她形容那是一台摩托罗拉电视机

translation.en: and we recalled having seen a TV similar to that
translation.zh: ‎我们想起当初搜查加西的住所时

translation.en: when we went into Gacy's house during the search warrant.
translation.zh: ‎曾经看过一台类似的电视机

translation.en: So Bob Schultz said he had to use the restroom,
translation.zh: ‎于是鲍勃·舒尔茨借故上厕所

translation.en: which would get him into the other part of the house where he could search.
translation.zh: ‎乘机潜入屋里其他房间搜索

translation.en: My job became then to keep John entertained
translation.zh: ‎我当时的任务是跟约翰聊天

translation.en: so he didn't go looking for Bob.
translation.zh: ‎确保他不会跑去找鲍勃

translation.en: Bob looked around, couldn't find the TV.
translation.zh: ‎鲍勃四处查看 却找不到那台电视机

translation.en: So he's in the bathroom,
translation.zh: ‎于是他在厕所里

translation.en: flushin' the toilet like a good guy should. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎像个好市民一样冲马桶

translation.en: But then, the heat kicked on.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 厕所的温度开始上升

translation.en: And that made all the difference in the world
translation.zh: ‎也是在那一刻 整个局势都反转了

translation.en: because Bob was right there by the heating duct, and this came up,
translation.zh: ‎因为当时鲍勃就站在通风道旁

translation.en: and he got a whiff of that like you wouldn't believe.
translation.zh: ‎他闻到一股难以置信的气味

translation.en: And right away, he thought, "A putrid odor?"
translation.zh: ‎他马上就想到那是腐尸味

translation.en: Yes, it was.
translation.zh: ‎他的想法没错

translation.en: We've been on the job for too long, we've handled too many dead bodies.
translation.zh:
‎我们是资深警探
‎处理过数之不尽的尸体

translation.en: If he says that's what it was, you can take it to the bank.
translation.zh: ‎如果他说是腐尸味 那就绝对不会错

translation.en: Schultz recognized an odor that he knew was decomposing flesh.
translation.zh: ‎舒尔茨闻出那是腐尸味

translation.en: A body, a dead body.
translation.zh: ‎也就是尸臭味

translation.en: Anyway, he comes back at the end of his shift and tells me about the smell.
translation.zh:
‎回到警局后
‎他跟我说他闻到那股尸臭味

translation.en: Well at the same time, I was hell-bent on trying to find a way to get underneath Gacy's skin
translation.zh:
‎与此同时 我在绞尽脑汁地想出
‎一个足以惹他发飙的方法

translation.en: to… to make him lose his temper and slip up and make a mistake.
translation.zh:
‎让他情绪失控 不小心走错一步
‎并透露实情

translation.en: Say something, you know, that would be incriminating.
translation.zh: ‎说出与案情有关的事

translation.en: David Cram worked for him, for his company PDM.
translation.zh: ‎大卫·克拉姆是他公司的职员

translation.en: I said, "Let's get Cram back in here for an interview."
translation.zh: ‎我提议把克拉姆叫来警局问话

translation.en: "Drag him back. Let's talk to him some more."
translation.zh: ‎“把他拖过来 我们再问问他”

translation.en: So, I'm talking to Cram, and I said to him,
translation.zh:
‎于是我找来克拉姆问话 ‎我问他：“你看过加西
‎彻底情绪失控的样子吗？”

translation.en: "Did you ever see Gacy completely lose his temper?"
translation.zh:
‎我问他：“你看过加西
‎彻底情绪失控的样子吗？”

translation.en: He says, "Yeah." I say, "What… what was the circumstance?"
translation.zh:
‎他说：“看过”
‎我问：“在什么情况下？”

translation.en: He says, "Well, Gacy had me digging in the crawl space."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“有一次加西
‎叫我在架空层里挖坑的时候”

translation.en: And he says, "I changed directions."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“我只不过换了个方向挖

translation.en: "Instead of going on a straight line, I went on a diagonal."
translation.zh: ‎我没有往直向挖 而是往横向挖

translation.en: "Gacy came down to check on what I was doing, how I was digging."
translation.zh: ‎加西过来查看时发现我挖的方向后

translation.en: "He saw a diagonal instead of a straight line, he completely lost his temper."
translation.zh: ‎整个人彻底崩溃了”

translation.en: Swearing, jumping up and down, hollering, screaming,
translation.zh: ‎他口飙脏话、暴跳如雷、大吼大叫

translation.en: "Goddamn it, I told you. I want you to dig here, not here."
translation.zh:
‎他破口大骂：“真他妈的
‎我叫你挖这边 不是挖那边！”

translation.en: And that's what got me thinking, the whole time we were doing this,
translation.zh:
‎这令我想起了
‎我们执行这项任务的目的

translation.en: we're trying to figure out where these people went.
translation.zh: ‎也就是找出这些人的下落

translation.en: Where are they?
translation.zh: ‎他们到底在哪里？

translation.en: And, you know, in my wildest dreams, I say, "It can't possibly be,"
translation.zh:
‎于是我产生了一个匪夷所思的想法
‎我心想：“怎么可能？”

translation.en: but then you hear a story,
translation.zh: ‎接着我们听到另一个人的口供

translation.en: and then you go, "Is it possible that there's somebody down there?"
translation.zh:
‎于是我想到了一个可能性：
‎“他们有没有可能被埋在地底下？”

translation.en: So I, that… with that, I had, um…
translation.zh: ‎有了这个想法 我必须…

translation.en: my mission was… [laughs] …was to get Terry Sullivan to give us a second search warrant,
translation.zh:
‎我的任务是叫特里·沙利文
‎发放第二个搜查令

translation.en: which is not usual.
translation.zh: ‎这是很不寻常的情况

translation.en: Two search warrants on the same property.
translation.zh: ‎对同一间房子下达了两个搜查令

translation.en: That was crazy. Come on. We gotta get this second search warrant.
translation.zh:
‎太不可思议了
‎但我们一定要弄到第二个搜查令

translation.en: "We need the second search warrant!" Terry says, "You can't."
translation.zh:
‎“我们需要第二个搜查令”
‎特里说：“不可能”

translation.en: I said, "We gotta… Figure it out! You're the lawyer!"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“你可是律师 想想办法吧！”

translation.en: [Sullivan] What we needed during those days was evidence.
translation.zh: ‎那个年代我们需要证据

translation.en: We needed to hook the evidence onto Gacy so it wouldn't fall off.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须把证据和加西牵连起来
‎这条线不能断

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] "I came home after school to get something to eat before I went shopping."
translation.zh:
‎那天我回家吃点东西
‎打算一会儿去购物

translation.en: "The phone rang, they asked me questions about the film slip."
translation.zh:
‎电话突然响了
‎警察问我那张底片单据的下落

translation.en: The night that Rob went missing,
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特失踪那一晚

translation.en: I was, um, handing in some film to be processed at the pharmacy.
translation.zh: ‎我负责整理客户拿去药房冲洗的底片

translation.en: And I filled out my envelope,
translation.zh: ‎我把照片放进信封里

translation.en: and I put it in the pack that was to be picked up.
translation.zh:
‎然后放在一个箱子里
‎等客户前来领取

translation.en: And I tore off the receipt,
translation.zh: ‎期间我把单据撕了下来

translation.en: and then I put the receipt in the little trash box that was near the side of the cash register.
translation.zh:
‎准备把单据扔进收音机旁
‎一个小小的垃圾桶里

translation.en: And then, um, I just kind of stopped.
translation.zh: ‎就在那一刻 我的动作突然停了下来

translation.en: And then, I stared at that receipt, and it stared back at me.
translation.zh:
‎我盯着手上那张单据
‎那张单据似乎也在盯着我

translation.en: And for an unknown reason,
translation.zh: ‎也不知道什么原因 我抓起那张单据

translation.en: I grabbed the receipt and I stuck it in Rob's jacket pocket.
translation.zh: ‎也不知道什么原因 我抓起那张单据 ‎把它塞进罗伯特外套的口袋里

translation.en: [Sullivan] Thank God Kim Byers had put that little receipt
translation.zh: ‎好在金·布莱恩斯把那张小小的单据

translation.en: into her pocket,
translation.zh: ‎放进了她的口袋

translation.en: which turns out to be Rob's coat.
translation.zh: ‎刚巧她穿着罗伯特的外套

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] Those are those hunches, or intuitions, whatever you wanna call them.
translation.zh: ‎有时候在第六感、直觉什么的驱使下

translation.en: They drive us to do things that we're not sure why we do.
translation.zh: ‎我们会不明所以地做出某件事

translation.en: I call them "God whispers,"
translation.zh: ‎我称之为“神的耳语”吧

translation.en: where someone guides you to do something.
translation.zh: ‎有人在引导我们去做某件事

translation.en: [Tovar] That receipt wound up in the trash at John Wayne Gacy's house.
translation.zh:
‎结果我们在约翰·加西家的垃圾桶内
‎找到了那张单据

translation.en: And that was our first connection putting Robert in that house.
translation.zh:
‎那也是我们第一次联想到
‎罗伯特可能被困在加西家里

translation.en: [Sullivan] We had it sent out to the crime lab
translation.zh: ‎我们把单据送到罪证化验室去

translation.en: to see if they could match it up
translation.zh: ‎看看那张单据

translation.en: to the envelope of developed film.
translation.zh: ‎跟底片的信封是否吻合

translation.en: And, in fact, there was a match,
translation.zh: ‎结果吻合

translation.en: exactly how it was torn off
translation.zh: ‎根本就是直接从信封上撕下来的

translation.en: and the different little pieces and angles that were still in there.
translation.zh: ‎各种小细节和撕裂角度都还在

translation.en: Wow, it perfectly matched.
translation.zh: ‎完全吻合

translation.en: We were, of course, very happy 'cause that looks really good in court.
translation.zh:
‎我们当然非常开心
‎因为足以作为呈堂证据

translation.en: [Bedoe] The receipt for the film from Kim Byers, plus the smell,
translation.zh: ‎金·布莱恩斯的单据 加上那股异味…

translation.en: that was enough for Terry to say okay,
translation.zh: ‎足以让特里点头

translation.en: and he drew up a second warrant.
translation.zh: ‎于是他签批了第二个搜查令

translation.en: [Robinson] We had a lot of heat on him at this time,
translation.zh: ‎（1978年12月20日） ‎这次我们给约翰施加了很大的压力

translation.en: and we could tell from John's deportment that he could feel the pressure too.
translation.zh:
‎从约翰的行为反应中
‎我们看出他也感受到了那股压力

translation.en: [Amirante] The net was kind of closing in on him.
translation.zh: ‎眼看即将东窗事发

translation.en: The web was closing in on him at the time.
translation.zh: ‎眼看纸再也包不住火

translation.en: His cat and mouse game was coming to an end.
translation.zh: ‎他的猫抓老鼠戏码唱不下去了

translation.en: [Tovar] I think we started noticing that something was happening to him,
translation.zh: ‎我们开始意识到他的表现不太对劲

translation.en: which eventually did.
translation.zh: ‎最后他终于失控了

translation.en: He finally just kinda went off the rails a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎他终于开始表现得有点失常了

translation.en: [Amirante] John Gacy called me, wanted to get together
translation.zh:
‎约翰·加西打电话给我
‎想要见我们一面

translation.en: because he told me that he had something new
translation.zh: ‎他说他有新的情报

translation.en: to tell me and Leroy Stevens.
translation.zh: ‎想要告知我和勒罗伊·史蒂文斯

translation.en: And I told him, "John, if it's something new, fine."
translation.zh: ‎我跟他说：“如果是新情报 那就好

translation.en: "Otherwise, I don't wanna hear the same old bullshit from you."
translation.zh: ‎我不想再听你说些有的没的”

translation.en: [Gacy] Rationally and understandably,
translation.zh: ‎情理之下

translation.en: I went over to talk to Sam about the harassment,
translation.zh: ‎我跟萨姆说警察骚扰公司职员的事

translation.en: not of me,
translation.zh: ‎警察没有骚扰我

translation.en: but why they were harassing my employees.
translation.zh: ‎但他们为什么要骚扰我的职员？

translation.en: Why was I defending them?
translation.zh: ‎我为什么要捍卫他们？

translation.en: Was I afraid they were gonna say something about what I was doing?
translation.zh:
‎我是不是担心他们会透露
‎我所做过的事？

translation.en: He came and told me the same old story,
translation.zh: ‎他来找我说同样的事

translation.en: vehemently denying anything to do with this kid.
translation.zh: ‎矢口否认他和那些失踪少年有关

translation.en: I… I didn't believe him anymore. I really did not believe him.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻我已经不再相信他了 真的

translation.en: I had a picture of Robbie Piest
translation.zh:
‎我桌上搁着一张
‎罗伯特·皮斯特的照片

translation.en: that was on the front page of the Daily Herald, the suburban news daily out there.
translation.zh:
‎那张照片刊登在
‎《每日先驱报》地方版的头版上

translation.en: I started pounding on the table. I said… I said, "Look at this, Gacy! Look at this, John!"
translation.zh:
‎我开始拍桌开骂：
‎“加西 你看 约翰 你自己看”

translation.en: "This kid is missing! They think you did it!"
translation.zh: ‎这个孩子失踪了 警察认为是你干的

translation.en: "Stop lying to me!"
translation.zh: ‎别再对我说谎了！”

translation.en: I yelled at him like that. I pounded the thing.
translation.zh: ‎我用这种语气边拍桌边破口大骂

translation.en: And he got very sheepish, and he said, "Do you have anything to drink here?"
translation.zh:
‎他显得窘迫不安
‎于是他问：“这里有酒吗？”

translation.en: I poured a little vino for me, a little bit for Gacy, little bit for Stevens.
translation.zh:
‎我分别给自己、加西和史蒂文斯
‎倒了一点葡萄酒

translation.en: We each drank a shot of it.
translation.zh: ‎我们各自喝了一杯

translation.en: And Gacy said, "Fill up my cup."
translation.zh: ‎加西说：“给我再添一杯”

translation.en: And I filled his cup up,
translation.zh: ‎于是我给他再添一杯

translation.en: and he just chugged it down, chugged it down.
translation.zh: ‎他一口喝干了那杯酒

translation.en: He looks at the picture of Robbie Piest, he goes, um… [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: ‎接着他盯着罗伯特·皮斯特的照片说

translation.en: "This boy is dead." Just like that.
translation.zh:
‎“这个孩子已经死了”
‎就这么简单一句话

translation.en: My heart…
translation.zh: ‎我的心…

translation.en: My heart start… boom-boom… started pounding.
translation.zh: ‎我的心开始扑通扑通地跳

translation.en: It was just…
translation.zh: ‎那一刻…

translation.en: I'm like, "What? What am I getting into here?"
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“搞什么？
‎这到底是怎么回事？”

translation.en: Then he says… And Leroy and I are just sitting here watching him, and he goes,
translation.zh:
‎我和勒罗伊只是静静地坐在一旁听
‎接着他说…

translation.en: "I've been a judge, jury, and executioner of many, many people."
translation.zh:
‎“我一直是很多人的
‎法官、陪审员和刽子手

translation.en: Now I wanna be my own judge, jury, and executioner."
translation.zh:
‎如今我想成为自己的
‎法官、陪审员和刽子手

translation.en: "I wanna tell you everything that happened."
translation.zh: ‎我要告诉你们整个事发经过”

translation.en: [Amirante] I aged many, many years during that night, uh,
translation.zh: ‎那一晚 我一下子老了很多年

translation.en: both as a lawyer, uh, and as a person.
translation.zh: ‎身为律师也好 身为人也罢

translation.en: It was one of the scariest nights of my life.
translation.zh: ‎那是我人生中最惊心动魄的一夜

translation.en: My heart was pounding out of my chest the rest of the night,
translation.zh:
‎整个晚上
‎我的心脏几乎要跳出胸口了

translation.en: s-smoking one cigarette after another one.
translation.zh: ‎烟一支接一支地抽

translation.en: Leroy was smoking. He turned…
translation.zh: ‎勒罗伊也抽个不停

translation.en: He… he lit his cigarettes backwards. The filter was on the wrong end.
translation.zh: ‎有一次还把烟点反了 他叼着烟芯

translation.en: And after he told us all this…
translation.zh: ‎加西把真相告诉我们后

translation.en: he, um… he fell asleep.
translation.zh: ‎就睡着了

translation.en: [Gacy] I don't remember exactly what happened.
translation.zh: ‎我不太记得发生了什么事

translation.en: I can remember I went to Sam's office,
translation.zh: ‎我只记得我去了萨姆的事务所

translation.en: but I did not go to Sam's office to tell him all that shit.
translation.zh:
‎我去萨姆的事务所
‎不是为了把真相告诉他

translation.en: Evidently, when I got there…
translation.zh: ‎我抵达事务所后

translation.en: something else took over and some other conversation come up.
translation.zh:
‎显然有人主导了整个对话
‎于是话题就变了

translation.en: It was a horrible, professional, ethical spot for me as a young lawyer.
translation.zh:
‎当时我是个年轻的律师
‎我要带着惶恐的心情 ‎以专业和道德的角度去处理此案

translation.en: I was 30 years old.
translation.zh: ‎那年我才30岁

translation.en: And, uh, Leroy, you know, we had to figure…
translation.zh: ‎我和勒罗伊必须想出一个方案

translation.en: The best thing to do is get him to a psychiatrist, have him committed,
translation.zh:
‎最理想的方案是带他去见精神科医生
‎叫他认罪

translation.en: and then figure out what to do with this guy.
translation.zh: ‎再想想能怎么处理这个人

translation.en: So we set up an appointment for, like, eight o'cl… eight, nine o'clock in the morning
translation.zh:
‎于是我们那晚便联络上了
‎一个精神科医生

translation.en: with the psychiatrist we found during the night.
translation.zh: ‎约好隔天早上8、9点去见他

translation.en: [Albrecht] My partner and I started that night
translation.zh: ‎那晚我和拍档的监视班次

translation.en: at Gacy's attorney, Sam Amirante's, office in Park Ridge, downtown Park Ridge.
translation.zh:
‎是在加西的代表律师萨姆·阿米兰特
‎位于帕克里奇的事务所开始

translation.en: So just as I got to the building,
translation.zh: ‎我刚抵达那栋大楼

translation.en: Sam Amirante and his other attorney, Leroy Stevens,
translation.zh:
‎萨姆·阿米兰特和另一个律师
‎勒罗伊·史蒂文斯

translation.en: were coming out of his office
translation.zh: ‎就从事务所走出来

translation.en: and into the vestibule, the whole building there,
translation.zh: ‎他们站在大楼的前厅

translation.en: and they invited us in.
translation.zh: ‎邀请我们进去

translation.en: And they couldn't be nice enough to us. They cou…
translation.zh: ‎他们对我们的态度非常友善

translation.en: "You want a bottle of booze? Want anything to eat?" Um…
translation.zh:
‎“要不要喝一瓶酒？
‎要不要吃点什么？

translation.en: "Whatever you want, we'll get for you. You can't let Gacy go."
translation.zh: ‎想要什么尽管说 我们一定去弄来 ‎总之你们不能放走加西

translation.en: "If he tries to leave,
translation.zh:
‎如果他企图离开
‎你们一定要开枪打爆他的车轮

translation.en: you gotta shoot his tires out, and don't let him leave."
translation.zh:
‎如果他企图离开
‎你们一定要开枪打爆他的车轮 ‎总之别让他离开 不能让他离开”

translation.en: "You can't let him leave."
translation.zh: ‎总之别让他离开 不能让他离开”

translation.en: Finally, we said, "Sam, we're not gonna shoot somebody's tires out."
translation.zh:
‎我们听了说：“萨姆
‎我们不能随便开枪打爆别人的车轮

translation.en: "Unless, why? Why should we be taking this kind of activity?"
translation.zh:
‎除非有什么原因
‎否则没必要做出那么激烈的行为”

translation.en: "Just do what you can."
translation.zh: ‎“你们能做什么就做什么

translation.en: "I can't tell you now, but you… you can't let him go."
translation.zh:
‎我暂时不能告诉你们原因
‎总之你们不能让他离开”

translation.en: [Amirante] About six in the morning, it started to get light.
translation.zh: ‎那天早上6点 天刚破晓

translation.en: Gacy starts waking up. He goes, "What am I doing here?" You know…
translation.zh:
‎加西一觉醒来
‎他问：“我怎么会出现在这里？

translation.en: "What… I got things to do. I got places to go today. I'm… I'm really busy."
translation.zh:
‎我有事要忙 我要去其他地方
‎我很忙的”

translation.en: I said, "John, you told me everything. You were here all night."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“约翰 你把真相都告诉我了
‎你整晚都待在事务所里

translation.en: "Leroy and I, you talked to us, you told us the whole thing."
translation.zh:
‎我和勒罗伊都在场
‎你把真相一五一十都说了”

translation.en: "Well, I can't talk about that. I got places to go, things to do."
translation.zh:
‎“我没空说这些事
‎我要去其他地方 我有其他事要忙

translation.en: "I'm outta here." Pew…
translation.zh: ‎我走了”

translation.en: Takes off.
translation.zh: ‎他转身就离开了
